name: Millennium Mall Quetta
description: Millennium Mall Quetta is the top shopping mall in Quetta, Pakistan, offering an international-standard shopping and entertainment experience. Featuring a wide range of branded stores, a spacious food court, kids’ play areas, prayer rooms, and multi-level secure parking, it is the perfect family destination for shopping and leisure activities in Quetta.

contact.address: Millennium Mall, Airport Road, Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: Gold City Shopping Mall
description: Gold City Shopping Mall on Jinnah Road in Quetta offers a premium shopping experience with a blend of fashion stores, jewelry shops, cosmetics outlets, and a lively food court. It’s a family-friendly mall known for its elegant ambiance, making it a top spot for shopping and dining in Quetta.

contact.address: Gold City Mall, Jinnah Road, Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: Complex of Quetta
description: Complex of Quetta is a modern multi-purpose shopping and entertainment complex located on Sariab Road. It features retail outlets, a mini-cinema, a well-stocked supermarket, and diverse dining options, making it a popular choice for families and visitors looking for shopping and entertainment in Quetta.

contact.address: Complex of Quetta, Sariab Road, Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: Galaxy Mall Quetta
description: Galaxy Mall Quetta is a premier shopping mall located on Zarghoon Road. Known for its luxurious architecture, wide selection of international brands, and a gourmet food court, it’s the ideal destination for shoppers and families seeking a complete shopping and dining experience in Quetta.

contact.address: Galaxy Mall, Zarghoon Road, Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: Quetta Trade Center
description: Quetta Trade Center on Brewery Road is a popular commercial complex featuring a variety of retail shops, electronics outlets, and casual dining spots. With ample parking and a central location, it’s a convenient hub for everyday shopping and leisure in Quetta.

contact.address: Quetta Trade Center, Brewery Road, Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: Sapphire Mall Quetta
description: Sapphire Mall Quetta, situated near Airport Road, offers a vibrant shopping atmosphere with fashion boutiques, lifestyle stores, and delightful eateries. It's a favorite spot among locals for trendy shopping and enjoying delicious meals in Quetta.

contact.address: Sapphire Mall, near Airport Road, Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: Delight Mall Quetta
description: Delight Mall Quetta on Toghi Road is an all-in-one shopping, entertainment, and family destination featuring a modern indoor playland, a variety of retail outlets, escalators, elevators, and ample parking. Known for its upscale environment and customer service, it’s quickly become a favorite shopping spot in Quetta.

name: QA Mall Quetta
description: QA Mall, one of the largest mall projects in Balochistan near Askari Park, offers a spacious, earthquake-resistant retail environment with multi-storey design, high-speed escalators, wide corridors, and extensive car parking. Designed as a future retail landmark, it's aimed at becoming the top shopping destination in Quetta.

contact.address: Near Askari Park, Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: Balochistan Askari Mall
description: Balochistan Askari Mall, a centrally air‑conditioned shopping complex, features a range of retail outlets, a food court, secure parking and a modern retail environment. It's one of the few fully climate‑controlled malls in Quetta, making it ideal for family shopping year‑round.

name: Dawood Shopping Centre
description: Dawood Shopping Centre on Tola Ram Road is a popular retail hub in Quetta, offering a wide range of clothing, ladies’ fashion, kid’s items and home accessories at reasonable prices. With ample parking, home-delivery options, and a vibrant shopping environment, it’s a go-to spot for everyday and occasional shoppers in Quetta.

contact.address: Tola Ram Road, Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: Safa Shopping Centre
description: Safa Shopping Centre on Tola Ram Road is a leading departmental store and retail mall in Quetta, featuring a variety of garments, beauty products, shoe shops, and accessories. With multiple floors and modern shelving, it’s a preferred destination for fashion-conscious shoppers and families exploring the latest trends in Quetta.

contact.address: Usman Jogezai Street / Tola Ram Road, Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: Haroon Shopping Centre
description: Haroon Shopping Centre on Tola Ram Road near Toba Masjid is a modern, climate-controlled retail complex in Quetta, featuring traditional handicrafts, fashion boutiques, children’s apparel, and a food court. With spacious aisles, cultural exhibitions, and convenient hours, it’s a shopper’s paradise offering both local culture and contemporary retail.

contact.address: Tola Ram Road, Near Toba Masjid, Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: A.R Shopping Mall
description: A.R Shopping Mall on Sariab Road is a vibrant retail hub in Quetta, offering clothing, electronics, household goods, and a food court. With wide corridors and ample parking, it’s a top choice for families and everyday shopping in Quetta.

contact.address: Sariab Road (Burma Hotel Chowk), Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan

name: City Center Plaza
description: City Center Plaza on Jinnah Road features a modern, multi-level retail space with branded apparel stores, a café lounge, and convenient parking. It’s a convenient and stylish shopping destination in Quetta’s city center.

name: Metro Shopping Complex
description: Metro Shopping Complex near University Road offers a wide variety of fashion boutiques, electronics, grocery outlets, and a small food court. It combines convenience with a friendly community feel, making it a preferred local mall in Quetta.
